DOC.criteria: Body Masss Index ( BMI ) 25 30 kg/m2 Healthy ( determine medical questionnaire ) Able commit duration study Providing consent participation History cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) , diabetes , cancer , renal , thyroid hepatic disease History gastrointestinal surgery History sleep disorder Recent bacterial infection ( < 2 week ) Weight loss > 5 kg last 3 month Under antibiotic treatment ( medical nutritional program ) affect body weight , appetite , energy expenditure lipidlowering , hypertension inflammation glucose control last 3 month take hormone replacement therapy Excessive consumption product enrich probiotic ( > 4 serving per week ) within last 4 week start study History drug alcohol abuse ( > 2 drink daily ) Regular smoker ( 5 cigarette day ) Not eat breakfast regularly eat breakfast 6h00 . Not willing eat food serve study reason Physical activity level > 150 min moderate intense exercise per week Concurrent recent intervention study ( within 60 day )
